query: CREATE TABLE automations (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, triggerType ENUM('enrollment','purchase','course_complete','lesson_complete','signup','inactivity','tag_added','manual') NOT NULL, triggerConfig JSON, status ENUM('active','paused','draft') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', steps JSON, stats JSON, createdBy INT, createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
